TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeTypeDeclaration extends System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember

summary.span: 表示类、结构、接口或枚举的类型声明。

span.span: Represents a type declaration for a class, structure, interface, or enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以用于表示声明类、 结构、 接口或枚举的代码。 can be used to represent code that declares a class, structure, interface, or enumeration. 可用于声明嵌套在另一种类型的类型。 can be used to declare a type that is nested within another type. 属性指定的基类型被声明的类型的基类型。The property specifies the base type or base types of the type being declared. 属性包含类型成员，它们可以包含方法、 字段、 属性、 注释和其他类型。The property contains the type members, which can include methods, fields, properties, comments and other types. 属性指示类型声明，指示该类型的类型类别的值。The property indicates the values for the type declaration, which indicate the type category of the type. ， ， ，和方法指示该类型是类、 结构、 枚举或接口类型，分别。The , , , and methods indicate whether the type is a class, structure, enumeration, or interface type, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 某些编程语言仅支持引用类型或类的声明。Some programming languages only support the declaration of reference types, or classes. 若要检查支持接口、 枚举或值类型中声明的特定于语言的 CodeDOM 代码生成器，请调用方法来测试适当标志。To check a language-specific CodeDOM code generator for support for declaring interfaces, enumerations, or value types, call the method to test for the appropriate flags. 指示支持的接口，指示支持的枚举和指示对结构的值类型的支持。 indicates support for interfaces, indicates support for enumerations, and indicates support for value types such as structures. 可以生成一个类或结构实现一个完整声明中的，也可以分布在多个声明的实现。You can build a class or a structure implementation in one complete declaration, or spread the implementation across multiple declarations. 属性指示的类型声明是完整或部分。The property indicates whether the type declaration is complete or partial. 并非所有代码生成器都支持分部类型声明，因此应进行测试以这种都支持通过调用方法的标志。Not all code generators support partial type declarations, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用声明类型。This example demonstrates using a to declare a type. [!code-cpp[CodeTypeDeclarationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeDeclarationExample/CPP/codetypedeclarationexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CodeTypeDeclarationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeDeclarationExample/CS/codetypedeclarationexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CodeTypeDeclarationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeDeclarationExample/VB/codetypedeclarationexample.vb#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 用指定的名称初始化 类的新实例。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BaseTypes As CodeTypeReferenceCollection

span.span: Gets the base types of the type.

value.span: 一个 对象，它指示类型的基类型。

span.span: A object that indicates the base types of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在 Visual Basic 中，将不能继承基类型，但是它的实现一个或多个接口生成一个类，必须包括中的第一项集合。To generate a class in Visual Basic that does not inherit from a base type, but that does implement one or more interfaces, you must include as the first item in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 不需要为是否已实现该接口存在以及您正在引用它的类型。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 you do not need the for if the interface you are implementing already exists and you are referring to it by type. 例如，如果要实现接口，并将其添加到具有此语句的集合`ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(typeof(ICollection)))`，不需要上述`ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(GetType(Object)))`语句。For example, if you are implementing the interface and add it to the collection with this statement, `ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(typeof(ICollection)))`, you do not need the preceding `ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(GetType(Object)))` statement. 下面的代码演示的加法到引用的集合。The following code illustrates the addition of a to the collection that refers to . ```vb Dim ctd As New CodeTypeDeclaration("Class1") ctd.IsClass = True ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(GetType(Object))) ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference("Interface1")) ``` ```csharp CodeTypeDeclaration ctd = new CodeTypeDeclaration("Class1"); ctd.IsClass = true; ctd.BaseTypes.Add(new CodeTypeReference(typeof(Object))); ctd.BaseTypes.Add(new CodeTypeReference("Interface1")); ``` 前面的代码生成以下 Visual Basic 代码的等效项。The preceding code generates the equivalent of the following Visual Basic code. ```vb Public Class Class1 Implements Interface1 ``` 但是，实际生成的 Visual Basic 代码是以下。However, the Visual Basic code actually generated is the following. ```vb Public Class Class1 Inherits Object Implements Interface1 ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示该类型声明是完整的类型声明还是分部类型声明。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the type declaration is complete or partial.

value.span: 如果该类或结构声明是实现的分部表示形式，则为 ；如果该声明是该类或结构的完整实现，则为 。

span.span: if the class or structure declaration is a partial representation of the implementation; if the declaration is a complete implementation of the class or structure.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以生成一个完整声明中的类或结构实现，也可以分布在多个声明的实现。You can build a class or structure implementation in one complete declaration, or spread the implementation across multiple declarations. 实现通常提供一个完整的类型声明中。Implementations are commonly supplied in one complete type declaration. 在这种情况下，设置类型声明属性设置为`false`，指示该类型声明表示的类或结构实现的所有详细信息。In this case, set the type declaration property to `false`, which indicates that the type declaration represents all details for the class or structure implementation. 分部类型声明可以更轻松地生成的类或结构实现在不同模块中，你的应用程序的不同部分。A partial type declaration makes it easier to build different portions of a class or structure implementation in different modules of your application. 分部类型声明可以存储在一个源文件中或分布在多个最终将被编译到一起以形成组合的类型实现的源文件。The partial type declarations can be stored in one source file, or spread across multiple source files that are eventually compiled together to form the combined type implementation. C# 语言支持分部类型声明的类和结构通过`partial`关键字。The C# language supports partial type declarations of classes and structures through the `partial` keyword. Visual Basic 支持分部类型声明的类和结构与`Partial`关键字。Visual Basic supports partial type declarations of classes and structures with the `Partial` keyword. 并非所有代码生成器都支持分部类型声明，因此应进行测试以这种都支持通过调用方法的标志。Not all code generators support partial type declarations, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . > [!NOTE] > 类和结构支持分部类型声明。Partial type declarations are supported for classes and structures. 如果指定的枚举或接口的分部类型声明，生成的代码将生成编译器错误。If you specify a partial type declaration for an enumeration or interface, the generated code produces compiler errors. 当在多个声明中提供的类或结构实现，设置属性设置为`true`初始声明和所有补充声明。When supplying a class or structure implementation across multiple declarations, set the property to `true` for the initial declaration and all supplemental declarations. 初始声明必须完全指定的类型签名，包括访问修饰符，继承的类型和实现的接口。The initial declaration must fully specify the type signature, including access modifiers, inherited types, and implemented interfaces. 补充声明不需要重新指定类型签名。The supplementary declarations do not need to re-specify the type signature. 如果您重新定义补充声明中的类型签名通常导致编译器错误。A compiler error typically results if you redefine the type signature in a supplementary declaration. Visual Studio 2005 使用分部类型用户生成的代码与设计器的代码分开。Visual Studio 2005 uses partial types to separate user-generated code from designer code. 在 Visual Basic Windows 应用程序项目中，用户代码位于不受限定的分部类中`Partial`关键字; 设计器提供具有的分部类中显示代码`Partial`关键字。In Visual Basic Windows Application projects, the user code is placed in a partial class that is not qualified by the `Partial` keyword; the designer-provided code appears in the partial class that has the `Partial` keyword. 在 C# 中，用户代码和设计器代码会出现在分部类由标识`partial`关键字。In C#, both the user code and designer code appear in partial classes identified by the `partial` keyword. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用提供跨多个声明的类实现。This example demonstrates using a to supply a class implementation across multiple declarations. 该示例生成初始类声明语句，并设置属性设置为`true`。The example builds the initial class declaration statement and sets the property to `true`. [!code-cpp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/VB/source.vb#3)] 在示例中的不同方法扩展了类实现。A different method in the example extends the class implementation. 此方法会构建的现有类和集的新类型声明语句属性设置为`true`。This method builds a new type declaration statement for the existing class and sets the property to `true`. 编译器将合并到了一起，完整的类实现的两个分部类型声明。The compiler combines the two partial type declarations together for the complete class implementation. [!code-cpp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置类型的特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes of the type.

value.span: 一个 对象，它指示该类型的特性。

span.span: A object that indicates the attributes of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含相同类型的值由研究在运行时类型时。The property contains the same type of values used by when investigating a type at run time. 许多这些标志不对应于某些语言的类型声明语法。Many of these flags do not correspond to the type declaration syntax for some languages. 因此，只有下列标志则很大的影响: ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。As a result, only the following flags are significant to : , , , , , , , and . > [!NOTE] > 一些如标志中标记的含义与重叠的属性继承自。Some of the flags such as overlap with the meaning of flags in the property of that is inherited from . 属性是一个副作用类继承自，以便可以嵌套类。The property is a side effect of the class inheriting from so that classes can be nested. 中的标志应使用属性而不是在中的标志属性。The flags in the property should be used instead of the flags in the property. > [!NOTE] > 设置可见性标志的模式 (标志包含的字`Public`或`Nested`) 是掩盖所有可见性标志使用，然后设置所需的可见性标志。The pattern for setting the visibility flags (flags containing the words `Public` or `Nested`) is to mask out all visibility flags using the and then set the desired visibility flag. 例如，C# 代码语句以标识(名为`cd`) 的内部类原样`cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes & ~TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask) | TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`。For example, the C# code statement to identify the (named `cd`) as an internal class is `cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes & ~TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask) | TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`. 若要在 Visual Basic 中设置相同的值的代码是`cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes And (TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask Xor -1)) Or TypeAttributes.NotPublic`。The code to set the same value in Visual Basic is `cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes And (TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask Xor -1)) Or TypeAttributes.NotPublic`. 设置属性直接与可见性标志 (`cd.TypeAttributes = TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`) 会清除所有其他可能设置的标志。Setting the property directly to a visibility flag (`cd.TypeAttributes = TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`) erases all other flags that might be set.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeParameters As CodeTypeParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取类型声明的类型参数。

span.span: Gets the type parameters for the type declaration.

value.span: 包含类型声明的类型参数。

span.span: A that contains the type parameters for the type declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型类型声明包含一个或多个未指定名为类型参数的类型。A generic type declaration contains one or more unspecified types known as type parameters. 类型参数名称代表泛型声明主体中的类型。A type parameter name stands for the type within the body of the generic declaration. 例如，对于泛型声明类包含类型参数`T`。For example, the generic declaration for the class contains the type parameter `T`. 有关泛型的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 类库中的泛型](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/generics/generics-in-the-net-framework-class-library.md)。For more information on generics, see [Generics in the .NET Framework Class Library](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/generics/generics-in-the-net-framework-class-library.md).
